brief_title: A 6 Week Study to Determine the Effectiveness of R228060 in Adult Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder
brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to determine the effectiveness of 2 target doses of R228060 in comparison with placebo during 6 weeks of treatment in moderately to severely depressed adult subjects with major depressive disorder. Approximately 488 subjects will be involved in the study.
criteria: - Generally healthy adults on the basis of a physical examination, medical history, ECG and laboratory work-up. - Subject needs to meet criteria for diagnosis of moderate or severe major depression as defined by the protocol. - The subject also needs to be an outpatient to participate in this study.
